1.title: Best Part
1.lyrics:
You know that I see it, I know you're a star
Where you go, I'll follow, no matter how far
If life is a movie, know you're the best part

2.title: Best Part
2.lyrics:
You're my water when I'm stuck in the desert
You're the Tylenol I take when my head hurts
You're the sunshine on my life

3.title: Is This Love
3.lyrics:
I wanna love you, I wanna love and treat
Love and treat you right I wanna love you
Every day and every night

4.title: Always
4.lyrics:
And I'll be here
'Cause we both know how it goes
I don't want things to change
I pray they stay the same, always

5.title: Always
5.lyrics:
Always, can count on it sure as the stars in the sky
Always, you can count on it as sure as the sun will rise
Always, my love for you ain't goin' nowhere
Always, I will be here

6.title: See You Again (feat. Kali Uchis)
6.lyrics: You're the one that's always running through my daydreams

7.title: See You Again (feat. Kali Uchis)
7.lyrics:
Can I get a kiss?
And can you make it last forever?

8.title: SWEET/I THOUGHT YOU WANTED TO DANCE (feat. Brent Faiyaz & Fana Hues)
8.lyrics:
Well, they should call you sugar, sugar, oh, you're so sweet
'Cause, baby, you're the sweetest, sweetest, sweetest thing I've known
8.artist: Tyler, the Creator, Brent Faiyaz, Fana Hues

9.title: SWEET/I THOUGHT YOU WANTED TO DANCE (feat. Brent Faiyaz & Fana Hues)
9.lyrics:
If I compared you, the sun is a stand-in (Sun)
You got a smile that could light up a planet
9.artist: Tyler, the Creator, Brent Faiyaz, Fana Hues

10.title: CHERIMOYA
10.lyrics:
You're my favorite one
You're the rarest one (You're the rarest one)

11.title: Sandiego
11.lyrics: All of the love I ever need, inside you, is inside you

12.title: Forever Yours
12.lyrics:
And I won't let you down (I swear I won't let you down, down)
You have my word
Forever yours, forever yours
Yeah, girl, I'm all yours

13.title: ANGEL
13.lyrics:
But from what I know, you're always here to stay
You're an angel in disguise

14.title: Kora Sings
14.lyrics:
You've been with me, you're my angel
Please, don't you disappear

15.title: Dancing Circles
15.lyrics:
Hold me, hold me so much so we both let go (Both let-, both let-)
Glancin', you know I love you though (Know I love you though)

16.lyrics:
Sorry, I'm just scared of the future
'Til 3005, I got your back, we can do this, hol' up

17.lyrics:
No matter what you say or what you do
When I'm alone, I'd rather be with you

19.title: Love Is Only a Feeling
19.lyrics:
You got potential baby, just imagine us combined
I wanna see you shine like the gem that you are

20.title: Love Is Only a Feeling
20.lyrics:
Look, I love her curves but what's more preferred
Is the way she articulates words
Can't help observe and stare when she in the mirror

21.title: Love Is Only a Feeling
21.lyrics:
Wanna paint a picture, let's make it clear
The future so bright, baby, race you there, girl

22.title: Love Is Only a Feeling
22.lyrics: I thank the Lord for her, man, I swear I owe her

23.title: Show Me
23.lyrics:
A lifetime I provide for you, by the way
Don't you forget that I would die for you any day

24.title: GAMBA
24.lyrics:
Standing by myself until I stood for you
If I knew this love, I woulda looked for you
But I'm glad you found me, I'm glad you found me

25.title: SOMETHING ABOUT HIM
25.lyrics:
I really like how you do all the things that you do
I really like how you say all the things that you say

26.title: SUGAR
26.lyrics:
Spendin' all my nights alone, waitin' for you to call me
You're the only one I want by my side when I fall asleep

27.title: COUNT ON ME
27.lyrics:
I know that it'll be okay
You ain't even need no money
You can count on me

28.title: I'LL TAKE YOU ON
28.lyrics: No matter what you do I need you in my life

29.title: SUGAR
29.lyrics:
But I'll make it bright, baby, I want you to know
I'ma be there for you, I'ma make you see that
I want you, I want you

30.title: Life Eternal
30.lyrics:
Can you hear me say your name–forever?
Can you see me longing for you–forever?

31.title: FOLDED
31.lyrics:
And with you lookin’ like that and you talkin’ like that
It get hard for me to breathe
Feel like a star when you’re with me

32.title: IFHY (feat. Pharrell)
32.lyrics:
For example, ten minutes can't go past without you brushing my thoughts
That's fourteen forty a day so I'll say a hundred and forty-four times
I think about you or something like that

33.title: Hate CD
33.lyrics:
You're my addiction
I can't find the diction to what I feel

34.title: She's a Rainbow
34.lyrics:
Have you seen her all in gold?
Like a queen in days of old
She shoots colours all around
Like a sunset going down

35.title: I Wanna Be Yours
35.lyrics:
Hold your hair in deep devotion (How deep?)
At least as deep as the Pacific Ocean

36.title: I Wanna Be Yours
36.lyrics:
You call the shots, babe
I just wanna be yours

37.title: Fireside
37.lyrics:
Like in my heart there's that hotel suite
And you lived there so long

38.title: White Ferrari
38.lyrics: I care for you still and I will forever

39.title: Ivy
39.lyrics: I thought that I was dreamin' when you said you love me

40.title: Die Hard
40.lyrics: You know that I'd die for you

41.title: Lover, You Should've Come Over
41.lyrics:
All my riches for her smiles when I slept so soft against her
It's never over
All my blood for the sweetness of her laughter

42.title: K.
42.lyrics:
Holding you until you fall asleep
And it's just as good as I knew it would be
Stay with me, I don't want you to leave

43.title: Sunsetz
43.lyrics:
I wanna hear your voice
A love that nobody could destroy

44.title: OKAGA, CA (feat. Alice Smith, Leon Ware & Clem Creevy
44.lyrics:
My heart stops pumping blood when I see you (I see you, when I see you)
But I try to play it cool because (I like you, I really like you)
44.artist: Tyler, the Creator, Alice Smith, Leon Ware, Clem Creevy

45.title: Bewitched
45.lyrics:
You bewitch me
Every damn second you’re with me
I try to think straight but I'm falling so badly
